channel.title: CVE Feed for PickPlugins -- Team Showcase
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PickPlugins -- Team Showcase

item.title: CVE-2024-44002|2024-09-18T14:37:54.852Z -- pickplugins -- team%20showcase
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Team Showcase allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Team Showcase: from n/a through 1.22.25.

item.title: CVE-2024-43321|2024-08-18T14:13:54.780Z -- pickplugins -- team%20showcase
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Team Showcase allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Team Showcase: from n/a through 1.22.23.
